desc_c: 住宅的實用樓面面積包括住宅樓宇內用作非住宅用途的實用樓面面積，例如：會所／康樂設施、管理員辦事處／宿舍、電機房等。
desc_e: Usable floor area of residential buildings includes usable floor area in residential buildings for non-domestic use, such as club house/recreational facilities, caretakers' office/quarters, transformer room, etc.

desc_c: 表8.8：按樓面面積 (註釋 1) 劃分的新落成公共租住及資助出售居住單位
desc_e: Table 8.8 : Public rental and subsidised sale flats newly completed by floor area (note 1)

desc_c: 新落成公共租住單位的數目 (註釋 2)
desc_e: No. of public rental flats newly completed (note 2)

desc_c: 新落成資助出售居住單位的數目 (註釋 2)
desc_e: No. of subsidised sale flats newly completed (note 2)

desc_c: (註釋 1) 公共租住單位及資助出售單位的樓面面積分別以「室內樓面面積」及「實用面積」計算。詳情請參閱《香港統計月刊》第137頁的「概念及方法」。
desc_e: (note 1) Floor areas for public rental flats and subsidised sale flats are measured based on "internal floor area" and "saleable area" respectively.  Please refer to the "Concepts and methods" on page 137 of the Hong Kong Monthly Digest of Statistics for details.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 有關公共租住單位及資助出售單位的類別分類，請參閱《香港統計月刊》第136及137頁的「概念及方法」。
desc_e: (note 2) For details on the housing type classification of public rental flats and subsidised sale flats, please refer to the "Concepts and methods" on pages 136 and 137 of the Hong Kong Monthly Digest of Statistics.

desc_c: 屋宇署；房屋署；香港房屋協會
desc_e: Buildings Department; Housing Department; Hong Kong Housing Society

desc_e: No. of private residential flats with consent to commence work (note 2) - Major revision

desc_c: (註釋 1) 樓面面積以「實用面積」計算。
desc_e: (note 1) Floor areas are measured based on "saleable area".

desc_c: (註釋 2) 樓面面積以「實用樓面面積」計算。
desc_e: (note 2) Floor areas are measured based on "usable floor area".

desc_c: 屋宇署；差餉物業估價署
desc_e: Buildings Department; Rating and Valuation Department

desc_c: 表8.10：私人住宅樓宇平均售價及售價指數
desc_e: Table 8.10 : Average prices and price indices of private domestic premises

desc_c: 私人住宅樓宇平均售價 [元(每平方米計)]
desc_e: Average prices of private domestic premises [$/sq. m.]

desc_c: 私人住宅樓宇售價指數 (1999年=100)
desc_e: Price indices of private domestic premises (Year 1999=100)

desc_c: 每月分析的交易數目及樓宇地點各有不同。因此，樓宇平均售價及樓宇售價指數只可視為一個概略的售價趨勢。
desc_e: The number and location of transactions analysed may vary from month to month, consequently the average prices and price indices should be regarded as broad indicators of price trends only.

desc_c: 住宅樓宇的首次買賣並不會用作分析。
desc_e: Primary sales of domestic premises are excluded from the analysis.
Figures are classified by saleable area.

desc_c: 差餉物業估價署沒有收到成交個案。
desc_e: No transaction record received by the Rating and Valuation Department.

desc_c: 表8.11：按私人非住宅樓宇類別劃分的平均售價及售價指數
desc_e: Table 8.11 : Average prices and price indices by type of private non-domestic premises

desc_c: 私人非住宅樓宇平均售價 [元(每平方米計)]
desc_e: Average prices of private non-domestic premises [$/sq. m.]

desc_c: 私人非住宅樓宇售價指數 (1999年=100)
desc_e: Price indices of private non-domestic premises (Year 1999=100)

desc_c: 私人寫字樓 (甲級、乙級及丙級) (註釋 3)
desc_e: Private offices (Grades A, B and C) (note 3)

desc_c: 私人分層工廠大廈 (註釋 2)
每月分析的交易數目及樓宇地點各有不同。因此，樓宇平均售價及樓宇售價指數只可視為一個概略的售價趨勢。
desc_e: The number and location of transactions analysed may vary from month to month, consequently the average prices and price indices should be regarded as broad indicators of price trends only.

desc_c: (註釋 1) 九龍灣／觀塘的分界與18區區議會選區中的觀塘區相同。
desc_e: (note 1) The boundary of Kowloon Bay/Kwun Tong follows Kwun Tong District of the 18 District Council districts.

desc_c: (註釋 2) 數字只計算樓上單位。
desc_e: (note 2) Figures are in respect of upper floor units only.

desc_c: (註釋 3) 指數並非限於主要寫字樓地區。
desc_e: (note 3) Indices are not restricted to the main office districts.

desc_c: 表示少於5宗交易（只適用於私人寫字樓）。
desc_e: Indicates fewer than 5 transactions (applicable to private offices only).

desc_c: 表示少於20宗交易（只適用於私人零售業樓宇及私人分層工廠大廈）。
desc_e: Indicates fewer than 20 transactions (applicable to private retail and private flatted factories only).

desc_c: 差餉物業估價署沒有收到成交個案。
desc_e: No transaction record received by the Rating and Valuation Department.

desc_c: 表8.12：私人住宅樓宇新訂租約平均租金及租金指數
desc_e: Table 8.12 : Average rents and rental indices of fresh lettings of private domestic premises

desc_c: 私人住宅樓宇新訂租約租金指數 (1999年=100)
desc_e: Rental indices of fresh lettings of private domestic premises (Year 1999=100)

desc_c: 每月租出樓宇數目及地點各有不同。因此，平均租金統計數字只可視為概略的租金趨勢。
desc_e: The number and location of lettings may vary from month to month, consequently the average rental statistics should be regarded as broad indicators of rental trends only.
Figures are classified by saleable area.
